ingredients.ingredient: 6 jalapeno peppers - stemmed, seeded, and halved lengthwise
Â½ cup shredded Mexican cheese blend
3 tortilla chips, crushed, or more to taste (Optional)

cookingTips: Spread butter on the outside of tortillas for maximum browning and crispness
Arrange jalapeno halves cut-side down for even heat distribution and better filling retention
Cook on medium-high heat for 2-3 minutes per side until tortillas are golden and cheese is melted
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Would you cook the jalapeno peppers before assembling, or add them fresh to the quesadilla?
